description_text:
Hey guys, I'm assembling my Simsonn Pro X pedals and there is a wiring loom that came disconnected. There are two ports that sit at the base of the pedal that it would fit into, but I'm unsure which one is should go into. Can you please advise where it should go?

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Patrick Savina,  If you did not purchase the base plate, you can ignore this cable. It is used for the footplate LED strip.Â
